Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:



Imprisoner sighs.  "Ok, we're ditching our weapons."

Imprisoner sets down two laser pistols, a rapid firing laser rifle, a rifle 
that fires a net, three grenades, four charges, a rocket launcher, and a 
rifle that fires darts that eject a cyber-virus.

Predator sets down a rocket launcher, a laser rifle, three laser pistols, 
several grenades, two energon knives, and a charge.

Choran sets down a heavy laser rifle and energo-sword, as well as a pair of 
plasma pistols.
